alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN LEWIS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barnes Corners, or 12 miles southeast of Watertown, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Carthage, West Carthage, Herrings, Barnes Corners, Denmark, Black River, Rodman, Copenhagen, Evans Mills, Castorland, Deferiet, Worth, Calcium, East Rodman, Bellwood, Rector, Rutland Center, and Great Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
